title: Get-Paid.com
author: Get-Paid.com
content: Okay, so in November 2022, about 3 months ago, this forum was very helpful by helping us withdraw NGN from BC.gameSee the old thread here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5420043.0This time we got $53 BRL stuck there - 276 BRL:Once again, the system doesn't allow you to convert the $53 BRL to Crypto, and we don't have a Brazilian bank account.Are there here some Brazilian members who can assist with this?If not - then one option like suggested before, in the old thread, would be to bet with this amount on odds of 11.00 or so in some sports, then bet $500 on 1.08 or so - hoping the favored outcome will occur and then you withdraw the $540+ winnings from the other site.But please advise if you have any other better suggestions. Thanks again.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: You find more and more exotic currencies for online casino games, this time it's the Brazilian real, but you have more than $10 worth of funds to worry about, it's better to just use these funds for betting.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: have you verified if it possible to open directly a "multicurrency account" with a bank? this will allow you to withdraw ANY fiat currency you want... but in any case, since this is a small amount (it's around 10 euro) I will try directly to exchange with an user like you did the previous time...

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on February 22, 2023, 10:21:08 AMYou find more and more exotic currencies for online casino games, this time it's the Brazilian real, but you have more than $10 worth of funds to worry about, it's better to just use these funds for betting. It's not finding them, it's affiliate commission  Quote from: bitbollo on February 22, 2023, 10:25:40 AMhave you verified if it possible to open directly a "multicurrency account" with a bank? this will allow you to withdraw ANY fiat currency you want... but in any case, since this is a small amount (it's around 10 euro) I will try directly to exchange with an user like you did the previous time... Yes, where can we find a Brazilian user to do that?

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on February 22, 2023, 09:08:02 AMthen one option like suggested before, in the old thread, would be to bet with this amount on odds of 11.00 or so in some sports, then bet $500 on 1.08 or so - hoping the favored outcome will occur and then you withdraw the $540+ winnings from the other site.But please advise if you have any other better suggestions. Thanks again.  This is somehow risky if bet goes wrong then another 500$ will be stuck on Bc.game account. Why not bet on almost 50/50 match with -1% to -2% EV? This will just required you low amount and you can do the method multiple times until you finally won on the other casino. Try to use reddit on finding player from Brazil then just use the forum for the negotiation.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on February 22, 2023, 11:18:19 AM...Yes, where can we find a Brazilian user to do that?you can try also here on forum:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=134.0 here there is the Brazilian section of the forum (but I don't see much movement on it  )or in section "Service"https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0 here you can open your request for this service (specify on topic title that you're searching BRAZILIAN people just to avoid people spamming your topic).

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Thanks guys!  Found someone on Paxful who was happy to receive the transfer from BC.game - it goes pretty quickly and in Brazil it seems to be an instant transfer, so it's all good now, got Crypto for this, so thanks for your help.Close this thread now / Lock it? Leave it for others to comment?

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on February 22, 2023, 12:58:10 PMThanks guys!  Found someone on Paxful who was happy to receive the transfer from BC.game - it goes pretty quickly and in Brazil it seems to be an instant transfer, so it's all good now, got Crypto for this, so thanks for your help.Close this thread now / Lock it? Leave it for others to comment?  Nice you got some one to help you out with your deal.  I was about suggesting you ask questions about it in the Brazilian board for more information if a Brazilian could help you out but however, I would advise you get an escrow if you can for transparency and credibility so that there would not be any issue and if there is, it would be resolved amicably according to the terms and conditions you both agreed to and lastly, I was of the opinion that you lock this thread so as to avoid spamming since the real purpose for which this thread was created have been fulfilled.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on February 22, 2023, 09:08:02 AMOkay, so in November 2022, about 3 months ago, this forum was very helpful by helping us withdraw NGN from BC.gameOnce again, the system doesn't allow you to convert the $53 BRL to Crypto, and we don't have a Brazilian bank account.Are there here some Brazilian members who can assist with this?If not - then one option like suggested before, in the old thread, would be to bet with this amount on odds of 11.00 or so in some sports, then bet $500 on 1.08 or so - hoping the favored outcome will occur and then you withdraw the $540+ winnings from the other site.But please advise if you have any other better suggestions. Thanks again.  From the abbreviation of the country currency which I coloured, I suspect that you are a Nigerian. And you are a Sr. Member meaning you have been in the forum for a long time yet I have not seen you in the local board, well it is not compulsory to be there but it necessary. By the way if the $53 can't be converted to bitcoin which I guess you we trying to convert, that means BC.game has a limit of withdrawal and probably your withdrawal amount is not up to the stipulated amount. I don't think anyone from Brazil can do that because the policy is from the company. You can use it to bet as you said to increase the amount for the conversion.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on February 22, 2023, 12:58:10 PMThanks guys!  Found someone on Paxful who was happy to receive the transfer from BC.game - it goes pretty quickly and in Brazil it seems to be an instant transfer, so it's all good now, got Crypto for this, so thanks for your help.Close this thread now / Lock it? Leave it for others to comment?  If you think that the purpose of this thread has been served then you can close/lock the topic already.But if you wish for others to see it that someone might experience this the same problem from the same casino then you can keep it open for more discussions related to it.Unless, a mod decides to close it then that's the final verdict for keeping this thread open or close.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: sunsilk on February 22, 2023, 11:48:54 PMIf you think that the purpose of this thread has been served then you can close/lock the topic already.Yup, thanks guys.
